title: Japan cancels maritime fleet review after typhoon -spokesman
text:
Japan cancels maritime fleet review after typhoon -spokesman

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Oct 12, 2019 22:40)

© Reuters. Japan cancels maritime fleet review after typhoon -spokesman TOKYO, Oct 13 (Reuters) - Japan has cancelled a maritime fleet review planned for Monday, a spokesman for the Maritime Self-Defence Force said, after a fierce typhoon pounded Tokyo and surrounding regions over the weekend, causing flooding and widespread power outages. held four years ago, the review was due to include 46 naval vessels and 40 aircraft. Ships from Australia, India, the United States, Canada, Singapore and Britain were to join.

Japan cancels maritime fleet review after typhoon -spokesman
description: Japan cancels maritime fleet review after typhoon -spokesman
